com.jdroid.java.repository
Interface Repository<T extends Identifiable>

Type Parameters:
T - This is a parameterized interface.
All Known Subinterfaces:
DeviceRepository, FileEntityRepository, SynchronizedRepository<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHibernateRepository, DeviceHibernateRepository, FileEntityHibernateRepository, InMemoryRepository, SynchronizedInMemoryRepository
public interface Repository<T extends Identifiable>

Interface that all repositories must adhere to. It provides basic repository functionality.
